title: Workshop with Ale Paul and Gabriel Martinez
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080522023838im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/57_5106.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080522023838im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/155_4790.jpg)

There was a workshop with Ale Paul and Gabriel Martinez in Querétaro, México. Both are outstandingly talented. Too bad I had to miss it, there are more pics mixed between a bunch in:

[http://www.tiposlibres.com/blog/?p=6](http://web.archive.org/web/20080522023838/http:/www.tiposlibres.com/blog/?p=6 "http://www.tiposlibres.com/blog/?p=6")

 [‹ Windows XP — The End?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080522023838/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44413 "Go to previous forum topic") [Gill Sans Light ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080522023838/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44358 "Go to next forum topic")
author: rs_donsata

comments.content:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080522023838im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/P5050307_6521.jpg)

Pictures from last year’s workshop with Gabriel Martinez where he and Ale Paul met.

Héctor
Looks like some very lucky people had a great time. Wish I could have been there.
